abstract: Reporter's Notebook; thousands converge on memorial and cemetery in former Bosnian battery factory to mark 21st anniversary of Srebrenica massacre and to bury remains of newly discovered victims.

headline.print_headline: 6,000 Headstones After ’95 Srebrenica Massacre, and Counting
headline.main: 6,000 Headstones After ’95 Srebrenica Massacre, and Counting

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Since Carlotta Gall last reported from Srebrenica in 2000, some of the 8,372 victims of a mass killing have been buried there, with more remains discovered each year....
lead_paragraph: Since Carlotta Gall last reported from Srebrenica in 2000, some of the 8,372 victims of a mass killing have been buried there, with more remains discovered each year.
